page.title: 15WINCANTON TRANSPORT
page.content: { Wincanton Bulk Milk Reload Station has four main activites: 1:Milk is{collected}from 850 farms a day.It is used for many milk products. 2:Bigger tankers take a lot of milk to London to be{bottled}by Unigate. The bottles are delivered next morning. 3:Lorry maintenance is important;it is done on site. 4:Tankers have to be{cleaned}inside and out every day to stop bugs from growing. This is run by computers. Wincanton Transport has 58 farm tankers and 81 drivers for them; 56 tractor units,100 tanks and 96 drivers for them. 41{maintenance}people and 27 clerical and supervisory staff make a total of 260 employees. During May and June 1\ million litres of milk is collected per day falling to 900 thousand litres in August. They also carry wine & other liquids
